biotools.summary: This software program performs likelihood-based statistical analysis to solve a variety of genetic problems. Implementations are included for all common, and several novel, statistical genetic tests. Data sets can consist of qualitative or quantitative traits, pedigree or population samples, limited loci or dense SNPs.

bioschemas.name: Mendel
